thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Nordic banks explore common payments infrastructure

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nordic banks explore common payments infrastructure
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Dnb Asa said on Friday:
* NORDIC BANKING SECTOR TO EXPLORE COMMON PAYMENT INFRASTRUCTURE
* NORDIC BANKS ‍CURRENTLY EXPLORING POSSIBILITY OF ESTABLISHING A PAN-NORDIC PAYMENT INFRASTRUCTURE SUPPLEMENTED BY COMMON PRODUCTS​
* VISION IS TO CREATE, WITHIN NORDICS, WORLD‘S FIRST AREA FOR DOMESTIC AND CROSS-BORDER PAYMENTS IN MULTIPLE CURRENCIES (SEK, DKK, NOK AND EUR)​
* A HARMONIZED NORDIC PAYMENT INFRASTRUCTURE WILL CREATE A BETTER FOUNDATION FOR INNOVATION AND ENCOURAGE DEVELOPMENT OF NEW PRODUCTS AND SERVICES TO BENEFIT OF ALL END-USERS​
* BANKS BEHIND INITIATIVE ARE DANSKE BANK, DNB, HANDELSBANKEN, NORDEA, OP FINANCIAL GROUP, SEB AND SWEDBANK​ Further company coverage: (Reporting By Terje Solsvik)
